name: Warradle
description: Based on the popular word game Wordle, Warradle has been adapted by Kaurna Warra Pintyanthi to use Kaurna letters and words. Warra means ‘word’, ‘language’ or ‘speech’. It’s a fun way to learn Kaurna Warra - the reawakened Australian Indigenous Language of the Adelaide Plains. For more information and to purchase a copy of the Kaurna dictionary and other resources, visit www.kaurnawarra.org.au
